Title: The Taming of the Shrew
Writer: William Shakespeare (play), Paul Dehn (screen play by), Suso Cecchi D'Amico (screen play by), Franco Zeffirelli (screen play by)
Actors: Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton, Cyril Cusack, Michael Hordern
Plot: Brutish, fortune-hunting scoundrel Petruchio tames his wealthy, shrewish wife, Katharina.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 5 nominations.
